title: Configure Azure DevOps Test Plans integration in Katalon Studio
description: From Katalon Studio version 8.1.0 onwards, Katalon Studio can natively integrate with the Azure Test Plans   service of Azure DevOps (ADO). This integration helps you automatically submit test runs and results to ADO with release   information (release stage and release ID), execution logs,   reports, and images for analysis.

frontMatter.title: Configure Azure DevOps Test Plans integration in Katalon Studio
